definition[0]: the round object that you can see shining in the sky at night, and that moves around the Earth every 28 days
example[0]: the craters on the surface of the Moon
example[1]: The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
example[2]: The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
example[3]: The moon rose into the sky.
example[4]: The moon was shining in the sky.
